name: Open The Present
description:
Simple little mobile game I made in around a week, this is my first mobile game that I release and I will be uploading a video on the development. 

You click on the present on the screen until you hit 0 hits left, after that you can choose if you want to get "Candy" or "XP" candy are used to buy upgrades and multipliers and XP is just there to level you up.
